I'd highly recommend "Groundhog Day" if you enjoy a unique blend of comedy and philosophy. Bill Murray delivers a hilarious performance as a weatherman trapped in a time loop, learning valuable lessons about empathy and kindness along the way.

Another great choice is "How to Train Your Dragon", a heartwarming animated film that tells the story of a Viking and his unlikely friendship with a dragon. It's a fun, family-friendly comedy with stunning visuals and an endearing cast.

If you're looking for a comedy with a twist, I'd recommend checking out "Miss Congeniality". Sandra Bullock plays an unlikely contestant in a beauty pageant while trying to catch a bomber! It's filled with hilarious moments and entertaining characters.

Alternatively, "Malibu's Most Wanted" is another comedy that might tickle your fancy. This film features Damien Dante Wayans as a rich white kid who fancies himself black, kidnapped by two actors pretending to be murderers - it's certainly an unforgettable ride!

I'd highly recommend giving "Tropic Thunder" a try! This action-packed comedy stars an ensemble cast including Ben Stiller, Robert Downey Jr., and Jack Black. The plot revolves around a group of actors who are forced to become the soldiers they're portraying in a big-budget war movie due to some unexpected circumstances. It's filled with hilarious moments and witty humor that should make for an enjoyable watch!

If you're interested in something more eccentric and imaginative, "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" might be up your alley. This film features a unique blend of science fiction and comedy, following the adventures of Arthur Dent as he travels through space with his friend Ford Prefect after Earth is destroyed by an alien construction crew. It's definitely a fun and entertaining ride!

It's a heartwarming and hilarious tale that might resonate with the deeper depth you were expecting from 'Top Five'.

If you're interested in something a bit more whimsical, "O Brother, Where Art Thou?" is another great choice. This George Clooney and John Turturro film is set during the Great Depression and follows three escaped convicts searching for hidden treasure, all while accompanied by some fantastic folk music. Enjoy the journey!

It's a unique romantic comedy that follows a couple who undergoes a procedure to have each other erased from their memories after their relationship goes sour. Mark Ruffalo and Jim Carrey deliver standout performances in this thought-provoking film.

Another great choice is "Wreck-It Ralph", a hilarious animated movie about a video game villain who dreams of becoming a hero, leading to chaos in the arcade where he lives. With an amazing voice cast including John C. Reilly and Sarah Silverman, it's a fun watch for all ages!

This captivating story revolves around an Iowa farmer who transforms his cornfield into a magical place where dreams come true, starring the talented Amy Madigan alongside big names like James Earl Jones and Kevin Costner.

If you enjoy thought-provoking dramas, then "Gone Baby Gone" is another fantastic choice with Amy Madigan in its stellar cast. This gripping story follows two detectives investigating a child's kidnapping that takes an emotional turn both professionally and personally.
